#summary Database Query Parameters.

= <font color="#0044CC">Introduction</font> =

T.B.D.

In this version, 0.7, the least query means are provided.

  * Parameter as a key-value pair.
  * Logical "AND" concatenation of parameters.
  * Comma ',' as a list delimiter. Logical "OR" concatenation of list values.

= <font color="#0044CC">Parameter Definitions</font> =

Here,
we show the query parameters for the OVAL object types.
In the tables, each column means that:
  * *Parameter Name*: name of the parameter.
  * *Java Type*: type of the parameter value.
  * *OVAL XPath*: relative xpath of the target node in OVAL XML documents.
  * *List?*: whether the value can be a list or not.
  * *Wildcard?*: whether the value can contain wildcard(s); `'*'`.
  * *Examples*: key-value examples, as string representations.
  * *Notes*: additional notes.



== <font color="#0044CC">Definition</font> ==

|| *Parameter Name* || *Java Type* || *OVAL XPath* || *List?* || *Wildcard?* || *Examples* || *Notes* ||
|| id || String || `./@id` || Yes || Yes || `id=oval:org.foo:def:100`<br>`id=oval:org.foo:def:*`<br>`id=oval:org.foo:def:100,oval:org.foo:def:101`<br>`id=oval:org.foo:def:*,oval:org.bar:def:*,oval:org.baz:def:*` || - ||
|| version || int || `./@version` || No || No || `version=2` || - ||
|| definitionClass || !ClassEnumeration or String || `./@class` || Yes || No || `definitionsClass=vulnerability,patch` || The word "class" is a Java reserved word. ||
|| family || Family or String || `./metadata/affected/@family` || Yes || No || `family=windows`<br>`family=windows,unix` || - ||
|| platform || String || `./metadata/affected/platform` || Yes || Yes || `platform=Windows*`<br>`platform=Windows*,Solaris*` || - ||
|| product || String || `./metadata/affected/product` || Yes || Yes || `product=Acrobat*`<br>`product=Internet Explorer*,Google Chrome*,Mozilla Firefox*` || - ||
|| refSource || String || `./metadata/reference/@source` || Yes || No || `refSource=CVE`<br>`refSource=CVE,CPE` || - ||
|| refId || String || `./metadata/reference/@ref_id` || Yes || Yes || `refId=CVE-2010-0176`<br>`refId=CVE-2012-*`<br>`refId=cpe:/a:adobe:acrobat:*,cpe:/a:adobe:flash:*` || - ||
|| cve || String || `./metadata/reference/@ref_id` || Yes || Yes || `cve=CVE-2010-0176`<br>`cve=CVE-2012-*`<br>`cve=CVE-2010-0176,CVE-2010-0177` || a shortcut to refId ||
|| searchTerms || String || `./metadata/(title|description)` || Yes || No || `searchTerms=buffer` || - ||
